description: View and analyze Nmap results with this Grafana Dashboard.

targets.queryText:
SELECT unix_timestamp as time, 
       value as value1, 
       value * 2 as value2
FROM raw_table
WHERE time >= 1739064348376 / 1000 AND time < 1741656348376 / 1000
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

-- SELECT unix_timestamp as time, value as value1, value*2 as value2 From raw_table
-- WHERE time >= 1739064348376 / 1000 and time < 1741656348376 / 1000

-- SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ip) AS count
-- FROM hosts
-- WHERE start_time >= 1739064348376 AND end_time <= 1741656348376;
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT unix_timestamp as time, 
       value as value1, 
       value * 2 as value2
FROM raw_table
WHERE time >= $__from / 1000 AND time < $__to / 1000
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

-- SELECT unix_timestamp as time, value as value1, value*2 as value2 From raw_table
-- WHERE time >= $__from / 1000 and time < $__to / 1000

-- SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ip) AS count
-- FROM hosts
-- WHERE start_time >= $__from AND end_time <= $__to;

targets.queryText:
-- SELECT
--   "dddd5" As "os1",
--   66 AS "count4",6 AS "count13"
-- From raw_table

--  strftime('%H:%M', datetime(unix_timestamp, 'unixepoch')) AS time_group,
SELECT 
    strftime('%H', datetime(unix_timestamp+ 32400, 'unixepoch')) AS time_group,
    AVG(value) AS value
    -- COUNT(value) AS "count"
    
FROM raw_table
GROUP BY  strftime('%H', datetime(unix_timestamp+ 32400, 'unixepoch'))

--   os,
--   COUNT(*) AS "count"
-- FROM hosts
-- WHERE start_time >= $__from AND end_time < $__to
-- GROUP BY os
-- ORDER BY count DESC;

targets.queryText:
SELECT unix_timestamp as time
,value*(ABS(RANDOM() % 110)) / 10.0 as value3
From raw_table
LIMIT 1;

targets.refId: SELECT   COUNT(DISTINCT p.port) AS "Unique Ports" FROM ports p JOIN hosts h ON p.host_id = h.id WHERE h.start_time >= $__from AND h.end_time < $__to

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
    strftime('%H:%M', datetime(unix_timestamp+ 32400, 'unixepoch')) AS time_group,
    AVG(value) AS value,
    COUNT(value) AS "count"
    
FROM raw_table
GROUP BY  strftime('%H:%M', datetime(unix_timestamp+ 32400, 'unixepoch'))
ORDER BY unix_timestamp DESC
LIMIT 10;

panels.title: Live Hosts and Open Ports over Time

targets.queryText:
SELECT 
    strftime('%H:%M', datetime(unix_timestamp + 32400, 'unixepoch')) AS time_group,
    AVG(value) AS value,
    COUNT(value) AS "count"
    
FROM raw_table
GROUP BY  strftime('%H:%M', datetime(unix_timestamp + 32400, 'unixepoch'))

-- SELECT unix_timestamp as time, 
-- value*(ABS(RANDOM() % 110)) / 10.0 as value2
-- From raw_table
-- WHERE time >= $__from / 1000 and time < $__to / 1000 
-- ORDER BY time DESC 
-- LIMIT 10;

-- SELECT ip, 
--        (ports_tested * 1.0) / ((end_time - start_time) / 1000) AS avg_ports_per_second
-- FROM hosts
-- WHERE start_time >= $__from AND end_time < $__to AND ports_tested IS NOT NULL
-- ORDER BY ip;
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT 
    strftime('%H:%M', datetime(unix_timestamp + 32400, 'unixepoch')) AS time_group,
    AVG(value) AS value,
    COUNT(value) AS "count"
    
FROM raw_table
GROUP BY  strftime('%H:%M', datetime(unix_timestamp + 32400, 'unixepoch'))

-- SELECT unix_timestamp as time, 
-- value*(ABS(RANDOM() % 110)) / 10.0 as value2
